# active

**Instance Property**

A boolean value that sets whether the solver rotates the joint.

## Declaration

```swift
var active: Bool
```

## Discussion

Leaf hierarchies that do not need to be directly constrained can be deactivated to reduce the compute cost of the solver.
title: active
